alert.note: Alert for Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued February 03 at 1:31PM EST by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...Gusty winds and heavy rain will impact portions of southern Brevard and Osceola Counties through 200 PM EST... At 130 PM EST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Patrick Air Force Base, moving east at 35 mph. Other heavy showers and embedded storms will develop over Osceola county and move rapidly toward the east northeast. HAZARD...Winds up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Palm Bay, Melbourne, Rockledge, Cocoa Beach and Satellite Beach. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Inland Southern Brevard; Mainland Southern Brevard; Osceola; Southern Brevard Barrier Islands
